name: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the U.S. Marine Corps
name_original: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the U.S. Marine Corps
description: Halls of Montezuma: A Battle History of the U.S. Marine Corps is a computer game developed by Strategic Studies Group in 1987 for the Apple II. Ports were later released for the Commodore 64, Amiga, MS-DOS and Apple IIGS.
